verify_login_error.en: Login timeout. Please try again by refreshing this page.

verify_enrollment_error.en: Enrollment timeout. Please try again by refreshing this page.

intro_2f.en: You are authenticated as [user]. To prove your identity you have to perform additional authentication using your phone.

intro_enrollment.en: Enter the following data to create a new user:

instruction_tap.en: To authenticate, scan the QR code (or if the app is on this device, simply tap the QR code):

instruction_tap_push.en: We have sent you a push notification to authenticate. If you didn't receive the push notification scan the QR code (or if the app is on this device, simply tap the QR code):

instruction_qr.en: To authenticate, open the authentication app on your phone and scan the QR code below:

instruction_qr_push.en: We have sent you a push notification to authenticate. If you don't receive the push notification open the authentication app on your phone and scan the QR code below:

instruction_userpass.en: Or you can login with your username/password using the form below:

instruction_qr_enroll.en: Scan this code to enroll your phone with this new account.

intro_mustenroll_2f.en: You are authenticated as [user]. Since this is your first login, you have to connect your mobile phone to your account.

instruction_enroll_proceed_manually.en: If your phone indicates succesful enrollment but nothing happens in the browser, [link]click here to manually proceed[/link].

alternative_otp.en: If the instructions on your phone instruct you to login manually, [link]click here[/link].

alternative_userpass.en: To login with your username/password, [link]click here[/link].

descr_error_wrongotp.en: The correct OTP code was not entered. Please scan a new QR code and try again.

descr_error_userexists.en: The userid you entered already exists. Please use a different one.

descr_error_createfailed.en: There was an error while creating the new user account. Please try again later.

descr_error_userdatarequired.en: Userid and full name are required fields.

descr_error_invaliduserid.en: The user ID may only contain letters, digits, dots and underscores

enrollment_success.en: You have succesfully been enrolled. Please [link]proceed to log in[/link].

qr_youreyesonly.en:
In the next screen you will be shown a QR code that is for your eyes only.
Please make sure you are in a safe environment before you proceed.

attemptsleft.en: You have [attempts] attempts left before your account will be blocked!

attemptsleft_zero.en: Your account is now blocked. Please contact an administrator.

close_this_window.en: You have succesfully been enrolled. Please [link]close this window[/link].
